name: GenericHandlerUpgradeable
description: Handles generic deposits and deposit executions. This contract is intended to be used with the Bridge contract.

eventDecorators.name: Initialized
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when asset tokens are supplied to sponsor the yield source.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: A deposit is initiated by making a deposit in the Bridge contract.Data passed into the function should be constructed as follows: len(data) uint256 bytes 0 - 32 data bytes bytes 64 - END{contractAddress} is required to be whitelistedIf {_contractAddressToDepositFunctionSignature}[{contractAddress}] is set, {metaData} is expected to consist of needed function arguments.

parameterDecorators.name: resourceID
parameterDecorators.description: ResourceID used to find address of contract to be used for deposit.

parameterDecorators.name: depositor
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the account making deposit in the Bridge contract.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Consists of: {resourceID}, {lenMetaData}, and {metaData} all padded to 32 bytes.

returnDecorators.description: the raw bytes returned from the call to {contractAddress}.

functionDecorators.name: executeProposal
functionDecorators.description: Proposal execution should be initiated when a proposal is finalized in the Bridge contract.Data passed into the function should be constructed as follows: len(data) uint256 bytes 0 - 32 data bytes bytes 32 - END{contractAddress} is required to be whitelistedIf {_contractAddressToExecuteFunctionSignature}[{contractAddress}] is set, {metaData} is expected to consist of needed function arguments.

parameterDecorators.name: bridgeAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Contract address of previously deployed Bridge.

functionDecorators.name: setResource
functionDecorators.description: First verifies {_resourceIDToContractAddress}[{resourceID}] and {_contractAddressToResourceID}[{contractAddress}] are not already set, then sets {_resourceIDToContractAddress} with {contractAddress}, {_contractAddressToResourceID} with {resourceID}, {_contractAddressToDepositFunctionSignature} with {depositFunctionSig}, {_contractAddressToDepositFunctionDepositorOffset} with {depositFunctionDepositorOffset}, {_contractAddressToExecuteFunctionSignature} with {executeFunctionSig}, and {_contractWhitelist} to true for {contractAddress}.

parameterDecorators.name: resourceID
parameterDecorators.description: ResourceID to be used when making deposits.

parameterDecorators.name: contractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of contract to be called when a deposit is made and a deposited is executed.

parameterDecorators.name: depositFunctionSig
parameterDecorators.description: Function signature of method to be called in {contractAddress} when a deposit is made.

parameterDecorators.name: depositFunctionDepositorOffset
parameterDecorators.description: Depositor address position offset in the metadata, in bytes.

parameterDecorators.name: executeFunctionSig
parameterDecorators.description: Function signature of method to be called in {contractAddress} when a deposit is executed.
